Adding Images

To add images to your guide, first create an images/ directory and place your images inside. You may want to use jpegoptim or optipng to optimize your images. (On OS X, both are available via Homebrew.)

Then, from your documents, you can reference your images like so (abiding by the advice in the Accessibility Guide):

<img src="{{site.baseurl}}/images/images.png" alt="Example of
an included image">

Now click on the Updating the Config File entry in the table of contents.

This project is maintained by Xfinion.
